short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You use DuckDuckGo or Bing by default, yet sometimes you want to try the same search in Google? This extension is for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a nice blue button that performs the same search you just did on Google. No more copy/pasting your search query into google.com, this extension does it for you.
